title: Building Reliable Deployments: A Multi-Skill Validation System
description: A comprehensive story of how three skills worked together to prevent SSG build failures: skill-documentarian reviewed cv-creator for completeness, skill-coach built site-reliability-engineer with validation scripts, and site-reliability-engineer integrated pre-commit hooks to catch MDX errors before they break production builds.

skills.name: skill-documentarian
skills.role: Quality Assurance - Reviewed cv-creator skill for completeness, verified SkillHeader component usage, generated hero image, created ZIP download, and added skill to registry

skills.name: skill-coach
skills.role: Skill Architect - Built site-reliability-engineer skill with shibboleths and anti-patterns, created 3 validation scripts (Liquid, brackets, props), wrote 789-line SKILL.md with decision trees

skills.name: site-reliability-engineer
skills.role: Validation Guardian - Integrated validation into git hooks and build process, installed pre-commit hook, caught and fixed angle bracket error, validated all 45 skill docs

phases.name: Phase 1: skill-documentarian QA Review
phases.outcome: Reviewed cv-creator skill and found 3 critical issues: missing hero image, missing ZIP download, not in skills.ts registry (invisible on website!)
actions: Added cv-creator to skills.ts registry line 65

phases.name: Phase 2: skill-coach Skill Creation
phases.outcome: Built site-reliability-engineer skill following best practices with shibboleths, anti-patterns, and working validation scripts
actions: Designed skill with shibboleths encoding expert vs novice knowledge
Wrote 789-line SKILL.md with decision trees and activation keywords
Documented anti-patterns: full build validation, manual cache clearing, ignoring warnings, regex MDX parsing

phases.name: Phase 3: site-reliability-engineer Integration
phases.outcome: Integrated validation into git hooks and prebuild workflow, caught angle bracket error that would have broken production
actions: Updated package.json with validation scripts (validate:liquid, validate:brackets, validate:props, validate:all)
Created install-git-hooks.js script to generate pre-commit hook
Caught and fixed >10MB angle bracket in artifact-contribution-guide.md
Validated all 45 skill documentation files successfully

outcome.summary: Successfully created a comprehensive validation system that prevents SSG build failures through pre-commit hooks and prebuild validation. Three skills orchestrated to improve site reliability: skill-documentarian ensured cv-creator completeness, skill-coach built reusable validation tooling, and site-reliability-engineer integrated it into the development workflow.
learned: Multi-skill orchestration enables complex workflows where each skill contributes unique expertise
Validation scripts prevent SSG build failures by catching MDX parsing errors early
Pre-commit hooks provide fast feedback loop without waiting for CI/CD
Shibboleths encode expert knowledge that separates novice from professional approaches
Context-aware validation (skipping code blocks, frontmatter) prevents false positives
MDX has specific parsing rules: {{ ... }} must be wrapped in {`...`}, < and > near digits must be escaped as < and >
SkillHeader component prop changes (skillId â†’ fileName) need systematic validation across all docs
Integrating validation into prebuild ensures production builds only succeed when docs are valid
Git hooks enable proactive error prevention rather than reactive debugging
Skill creation is itself a skill (skill-coach) that can be documented and improved
